casebody.data:
SMITH
v.
BECK. No. 228P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Philip Allen, Assistant Attorney General, for Theodis Beck.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of April 2006 by Petitioner for Appointment of Counsel:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
